General.Name: Glodon Software Co Ltd
General.Description: Glodon Company Limited provides professional application software and support services to the construction industry in China. The company offers various products and services, such as cost management, BIM construction, and digital infrastructure. The company was formerly known as Glodon Software Company Limited and changed its name to Glodon Company Limited in June 2016. Glodon Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: E-13,10 Xibeiwang East Road, Beijing, China

7.Name: Mr. Kui Jiang Zhang
7.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
